meanings.definition: The behavior or actions of rowdy individuals.
meanings.sent1: The rowdyism at the party was disruptive.
meanings.sent2: The teacher had to address the rowdyism in the classroom.
meanings.sent3: The rowdyism of the puppies chasing each other was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The rowdyism of the storm could be heard from inside the house.
meanings.sent5: The rowdyism of the fans at the concert made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rowdy.
meanings.sent1: The rowdyism of the children playing outside was evident.
meanings.sent2: The rowdyism of the crowd grew as the game progressed.
meanings.sent3: The rowdyism of the squirrels in the park was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The rowdyism of the ocean during the storm was frightening.
meanings.sent5: The rowdyism of the market on weekends created a lively atmosphere.
